text:
Mona Malm (born Mona Kristina Ericsson; 24 January 1935 – 12 January 2021) was a Swedish actress. Her career began in 1957. Malm was born in Stockholm.
Malm was known for her roles in "Smiles of a Summer Night" (1955), "The Seventh Seal" (1957), "All These Women" (1964), "Heja Roland!" (1966), "Fanny and Alexander" (1982), "Nånting levande åt Lame-Kal" (1988), "The Best Intentions" (1992), "The Tattooed Widow" (1998) and "After the Wedding" (2006).
Malm died at a Stockholm hospital on 12 January 2021, at the age of 85.
